00028     m_Options.resize(1);
00029     m_Labels["current"] = 0;

00037 void Options::getOptionNames(std::vector<std::string> &names, int oI){ 
00038     for(size_t i=0; i < m_Options[oI].m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00039         names.push_back(m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->m_longName);
00040     }
00041 }
00042 
00043 void Options::getOptionTypes(std::vector<PgOpt::PgOptType> &types, int oI) {
00044     for(size_t i=0; i < m_Options[oI].m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00045         types.push_back(m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->m_type);
00046     }
00047 }

00049 /**
00050  * Check to see if an option is defined.
00051  * 
00052  * @param name - option name
00053  */
00054 bool Options::isOptDefined(const std::string& name, int oI) 
00055 {
00056   return (m_Options[0].findOpt(name) != NULL);
00057 }
00058 
00059 /**
00060  * Set option value
00061  * 
00062  * @param name - option name
00063  * @param value - value for the option
00064  */
00065 void Options::setOpt(const std::string &name, const std::string& value) {
00066         if (!m_Options[0].isOptDefined(name)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}
00067         m_Options[0].set(name, value);
00068   //Verbose::out(1,"Set string option " + name + " to " + value);
00069 } 
00070 
00071 /**
00072  * Set option to vector of values
00073  * 
00074  * @param name - option name
00075  * @param value - vector of values
00076  */
00077 void Options::setOpt(const std::string &name, std::vector< std::string > & values) {
00078   if (!isOptDefined(name)) {
00079     Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");
00080   }
00081   if (values.size() != 0) {
00082     if (m_Options[0].mustFindOpt(name)->m_allowMultiple)
00083     {
00084             m_Options[0].mustFindOpt(name)->m_values = values;
00085     }
00086     else
00087     {
00088             if (values.size() > 1) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " does not allow multiple values.");}
00089             if (values.size() == 1) {setOpt(name, values[0]);}
00090     }
00091   }
00092 }
00093   
00094 /**
00095  * Set option to vector of vector of values
00096  * 
00097  * @param name - option name
00098  * @param value - vector of vector of values
00099  */
00100 void Options::setOpt(const std::string & name, std::vector< std::vector<std::string> > & values ) {
00101   ///@todo should roll into PgOptions support for this rather than using a stand alone hack
00102   if (!isOptDefined(name)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}
00103   m_Options[0].mustFindOpt(name)->setValue(ToStr(values.size()));
00104   for (size_t i =0; i < values.size(); i++ ) {
00105     pushOpt(name, values[i]);
00106   }
00107 }
00108 
00109 /**
00110  * Add a value to a vector of values for option
00111  *
00112  * @param name - option name
00113  * @param value - value to push onto vector of values
00114  */
00115 void Options::pushOpt( const std::string &name, const std::string & value ) {
00116   if (!isOptDefined(name)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}
00117   m_Options[0].mustFindOpt(name)->pushValue(value);
00118 }
00119 
00120 /**
00121  * Add a vector of values to the values for an option
00122  *
00123  * @param name - option name
00124  * @param value - vector of values to push
00125  */
00126 void Options::pushOpt ( const std::string & name, std::vector< std::string > values ) {
00127   if (!isOptDefined(name)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}
00128   ///@todo should roll into PgOptions support for this rather than using a stand alone hack
00129   int nextRow = 0;
00130   
00131   while ( m_Options[0].findOpt( name + "::" + ToStr( nextRow )) != NULL ) {
00132     nextRow++;
00133   }
00134   m_Options[0].mustFindOpt(name)->setValue(ToStr(nextRow + 1));
00135   defOptMult("", name + "::" + ToStr(nextRow),PgOpt::STRING_OPT,"","");
00136   m_Options[0].mustFindOpt( name + "::" + ToStr(nextRow))->m_values = values;
00137 }

00140  * Parse and set options from argv
00141  *
00142  * @param argv - arg vector
00143  */
00144 int Options::parseArgv( const char * const * const argv, int start ) {
00145   return m_Options[0].parseArgv( argv, start );
00146 }

00148 PgOpt* Options::getPgOpt(const std::string& name, int oI) {
00149   if (!isOptDefined(name, oI)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}
00150   return m_Options[oI].mustFindOpt(name);
00151 }
00152 
00153 /**
00154  * Get the boolean value of an option
00155  *
00156  * @param name - the name of the option
00157  */
00158 bool Options::getOptBool(const std::string& name, int oI) {
00159   if (!isOptDefined(name,oI)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}
00160   if ((getOpt(name,oI) != "true") && (getOpt(name,oI) != "false") && (getOpt(name,oI) != ""))
00161   {
00162           Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " must be set to either true or false.");
00163   }
00164   return m_Options[oI].getBool(name );
00165 }
00166

00168  * Get the integer value of an option
00169  *
00170  * @param name - the name of the option
00171  */
00172 int Options::getOptInt(const std::string& name, int oI) {
00173   if (!isOptDefined(name,oI)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}
00174   return m_Options[oI].getInt(name);
00175 }

00182 double Options::getOptDouble(const std::string& name, int oI) {

00184   return m_Options[oI].getDouble(name);

00187 /**
00188  * Return a vector of values for a particular option
00189  * 
00190  * @param name - option name
00191  */
00192 std::vector< std::string >& Options::getOptVector (const std::string &name, int oI) {
00193     if (!isOptDefined(name,oI)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options snapshot for this engine.");}
00194     return m_Options[oI].mustFindOpt( name )->m_values;
00195 }

00212 void Options::printOptions(const std::string &prefix, int oI) {
00213   // Spit out to the log the options
00214   ///@todo kind of ugly how we are abusing PgOptions
00215   for(size_t i=0; i<m_Options[oI].m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00216     std::string name = m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->m_longName;
00217     std::string vals;
00218     if(m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->m_values.size() > 0) {
00219       vals =  "'" + m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->m_values[0] + "'";
00220       for(size_t j=1; j< m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->m_values.size(); j++)
00221         vals += ", '" + m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->m_values[j] + "'";
00222     }
00223     else {vals = "'" + m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->getValue() + "'";}
00224     Verbose::out(2, prefix + "Option '" + name + "' = " + vals);
00225   }
00226 }
